background: Deploy a tapstack-${EnvironmentSuffix}-named VPC in us-east-1 with three public and three private subnets, per-AZ NAT Gateways, an internet-facing ALB (with S3 access logging) in front of Auto Scaling EC2 across 3 AZs, and an Aurora MySQL cluster using a 3-AZ subnet group. Static assets use a versioned, encrypted S3 bucket with PAB; optional async handlers (Lambda+SQS+SNS) exist behind a consolidated IAM role with Lambda code sourced from S3. Resource names and tags include the EnvironmentSuffix for safe multi-env operation; stateful resources are protected with Snapshot/Retain policies.
author: iqbala-turing
